'''Fireflies''' are bioluminescent creatures that can be found across numerous locations in Teyvat. Normal fireflies are not listed in the living beings [[archive]] category.

==Types==
* Yellow Fireflies
* Purple Fireflies ([[Inazuma]])
* [[Lucklight Fly]]
* [[Malachitin Lumibug]]
